div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1346 Temnus environs, Aeolis, c. 1912 (991) Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 6 AR, c. 300 AE Alexander III: 6 late post. tetradr. (Tem- nus) Temnus: c. 300 AE Disposition: Oxford 52 MonatsblNumGesWien, 1913, pp. 164 f. Milne, NC 1914, pp. 260 f. Robert, BCH 1933, p. 495, note 1 (for the find place)
